name: pickle_berry
description: A Shell based program for fast file management
readme_summary: pickleBerry is a shell-based, TUI file manager designed for efficient keyboard-driven file operations. It provides a lightweight alternative to traditional graphical file managers, offering dynamic keybindings and essential file management features within a terminal interface. It requires familiarity with basic shell commands and relies on dependencies like bash, fzf, and tput.
key_features: Basic file operations (move, copy, rename, delete)
primary_use_case: Fast file management using a keyboard-centric interface in a terminal environment.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled artisan in a workshop, meticulously crafting a wooden filing cabinet. The artisan uses specialized tools, each labeled with keyboard keys like 'm' for move, 'c' for copy, and 'r' for rename, to organize digital files represented as glowing orbs. The filing cabinet is sleek and modern, subtly displaying the 'pickleBerry' logo. A small screen in the background shows a simplified file directory structure. The workshop is bathed in soft, focused light, creating a sense of precision and efficiency. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with clean lines and a warm color palette.

name: mousemaster
description: Efficiently control your mouse with keyboard inputs for a completely mouseless experience.
readme_summary: Mousemaster enables users to control their mouse cursor using only a keyboard, offering an alternative to traditional mouse input. It provides multiple navigation modes, including normal, hint, grid, and screen selection, all of which are fully customizable. This tool aims to enhance accessibility and productivity by providing a mouseless experience.
primary_use_case: Mouseless mouse manipulation for improved accessibility and productivity.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled pianist effortlessly playing a complex piece on a keyboard, while the piano strings visually transform into a mouse cursor dancing across a computer screen. The pianist's fingers glow with energy as they strike the keys, creating a seamless connection between keyboard input and mouse movement. Subtle UI elements float around the scene, displaying keyboard shortcuts and mouse coordinates. The repository name, 'mousemaster,' is subtly etched into the piano's music stand. The scene is set in a dimly lit concert hall with dramatic lighting. The image should be in a digital painting style with clean lines and clear details.

name: Scraperr
readme_summary: Scraperr is a self-hosted web scraping solution that allows users to extract data from websites using XPath selectors. It provides a user-friendly interface for managing scraping jobs, visualizing results, and exporting data in various formats. Key features include XPath-based extraction, queue management, domain spidering, and media downloads.
primary_use_case: Extracting data from websites with precision using XPath selectors.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled cartographer meticulously charting an uncharted island using advanced tools. The island represents the vast expanse of the web, and the cartographer uses a specialized lens (XPath) to precisely map and extract valuable resources (data) from it. The cartographer's desk is adorned with UI elements displaying scraping jobs and structured data tables. Digital particles flow from the island to the desk, representing the extracted data. The repository's name, 'Scraperr,' is subtly etched onto the cartographer's tools. The scene is set in a brightly lit, futuristic workshop. The image should be in a detailed 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and clear outlines.

name: stegcloak
description: Hide secrets with invisible characters in plain text securely using passwords üßôüèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è‚≠ê
readme_summary: StegCloak is a JavaScript steganography tool that hides secrets within text by compressing, encrypting, and cloaking them with invisible Unicode characters. It offers password protection, integrity checks, and high-speed performance, making it suitable for various applications like watermarking, covert communication, and data exfiltration via text.
primary_use_case: Hiding secrets within text using steganography for covert communication, watermarking, and data exfiltration.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled illusionist on a grand stage, concealing a glowing secret message within an ordinary-looking script. The illusionist waves a wand, embedding the message using shimmering, invisible glyphs. The audience sees only regular text, unaware of the hidden content. A spotlight shines on the text, revealing faint digital patterns woven into the letters. Small UI elements float around the stage, displaying encryption keys and compression algorithms. The repository name, 'StegCloak,' is subtly projected onto the backdrop. The scene is set in a modern theater with dramatic lighting. The image should be in a digital painting style with clean lines and vibrant colors.

name: awesome-privacy
description: ü¶Ñ  A curated list of privacy & security-focused software and services
readme_summary: The awesome-privacy repository is a curated list of privacy and security-focused software and services, categorized for easy browsing. It aims to help users migrate to open-source alternatives that respect their privacy and protect their data from corporations, governments, and hackers. The repository is mirrored on Codeberg and encourages contributions from the community.
key_features: Curated list of privacy and security-focused software and services
Categorized into various sections like Essentials, Communication, Security Tools, Networking, Productivity, Utilities, Operating Systems, Development, Smart Home & IoT, and Finance
primary_use_case: Providing users with a comprehensive resource for finding privacy and security-focused alternatives to mainstream software and services.
cover_image_prompt: A gardener tending a walled garden, carefully selecting and nurturing privacy-focused plants (software and services). The gardener uses a magnifying glass to inspect each plant for vulnerabilities, ensuring only the healthiest, most secure options thrive. A digital tablet displays the 'awesome-privacy' logo and provides information on each plant's security features. The garden is surrounded by a high wall, protecting the plants from prying eyes and data-hungry corporations represented by shadowy figures outside the wall. The scene is bathed in soft, natural light, creating a sense of tranquility and security. The image should be in a detailed digital painting style with clear outlines and vibrant colors, resembling a children's book illustration.

name: fingerprint-suite
description: Browser fingerprinting tools for anonymizing your scrapers. Developed by Apify.
readme_summary: The fingerprint-suite repository provides tools for generating and injecting browser fingerprints to anonymize web scrapers. It includes modules for generating realistic HTTP headers and browser fingerprints, injecting these fingerprints into Playwright or Puppeteer instances, and a Bayesian network implementation for fingerprint generation.
key_features: Generates realistic browser fingerprints affecting HTTP headers and browser JS APIs.
Injects browser fingerprints into Playwright or Puppeteer managed browser instances.
Provides a fast implementation of a Bayesian generative network for realistic browser fingerprint generation.
primary_use_case: Anonymizing web scrapers by generating and injecting browser fingerprints.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled illusionist stands behind a shimmering portal, expertly manipulating streams of light and code to create realistic browser fingerprints. The portal leads to a cityscape where scrapers, disguised as ordinary browsers, navigate undetected. The illusionist's hands glow with digital energy as they fine-tune the fingerprints. Subtle UI elements float around the scene, displaying header information and JavaScript API manipulations. The scene is set in a modern, high-tech workshop with soft, ambient lighting. The image should be in a vibrant, 3D isometric illustration style with crisp details and a focus on clarity.

name: panel
description: Pterodactyl¬Æ is a free, open-source game server management panel built with PHP, React, and Go. Designed with security in mind, Pterodactyl runs all game servers in isolated Docker containers while exposing a beautiful and intuitive UI to end users.
readme_summary: Pterodactyl Panel is an open-source game server management panel that allows users to easily manage game servers through a web interface. It utilizes Docker containers to isolate game servers, enhancing security and resource management. The panel provides an intuitive UI for end users to control their game servers.
key_features: Runs game servers in isolated Docker containers
primary_use_case: Managing game servers through a web interface.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a bustling air traffic control tower, but instead of airplanes, the screens display various game servers taking off and landing. A central controller, with multiple monitors showing server status and resource allocation, expertly manages the flow. Docker containers, represented as stylized hangars, neatly house each server. Subtle UI elements and code snippets float in the background, connecting the scene to software. The overall atmosphere is efficient and secure, with a clean, modern aesthetic. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and clear details, emphasizing the organized management of game servers.

name: exifLooter
description: ExifLooter finds geolocation on all image urls and directories also integrates with OpenStreetMap
readme_summary: ExifLooter is a Go-based tool designed to extract geolocation data from image metadata. It can analyze individual images, entire directories, and even process URLs piped from other tools. The tool also integrates with OpenStreetMap to provide visual context for the extracted location data and offers functionality to remove metadata from images.
key_features: Finds geolocation on image URLs and directories
Generates OpenStreetMap URLs from GPS location
primary_use_case: Extracting geolocation data from image metadata for OSINT and security purposes.
cover_image_prompt: A detective meticulously examining a digital photograph with a magnifying glass, revealing hidden GPS coordinates overlaid on a map. The detective is surrounded by floating image files, each emitting faint trails of metadata. A holographic OpenStreetMap projection displays the pinpointed location. Subtle UI elements show ExifLooter's interface, extracting data. The scene is set in a dimly lit, high-tech office with glowing screens. The image should be in a detailed digital painting style with a focus on clarity and precision.

name: scira
description: Scira (Formerly MiniPerplx) is a minimalistic AI-powered search engine that helps you find information on the internet and cites it too. Powered by Vercel AI SDK! Search with models like xAI's Grok 3.
readme_summary: Scira is a minimalistic AI-powered search engine designed to help users find information on the internet with proper citations. It leverages various AI models and APIs to provide features like web search, URL-specific search, weather information, code execution, location details, YouTube search, academic search, and more. Scira aims to provide a comprehensive search experience powered by AI.
key_features: Location information using Google Maps API, Mapbox API, and TripAdvisor API
YouTube Search with timestamps and transcripts
Trending Movies and TV Shows information
primary_use_case: AI-powered search engine that finds information on the internet and cites it.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a curious librarian in a vast, glowing digital library, using a magical magnifying glass to explore countless books and web pages. As she finds relevant information, it transforms into glowing citations that float around her. Small screens display snippets of code and AI models at work, subtly connecting the scene to software. The library is filled with warm, inviting light, creating a sense of discovery. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors, subtly incorporating the 'Scira' name into a book title.
